snippet: On its Web site, Windermere, a real estate firm, has begun using an online tool from Inrix, a company that does crowdsourced traffic estimates. It gives those looking for a home an hour-by-hour prediction of the drive times to their workplaces.
abstract: On its Web site, Windermere, a real estate firm, has begun using an online tool from Inrix, a company that does crowdsourced traffic estimates. It gives those looking for a home an hour-by-hour prediction of the drive times to their workplaces.

headline.main: Predicting Commutes More Accurately for Would-Be Home Buyers
